disclaimerData.disclaimer:
PATIENT AGREEMENT: This form provides information about the advantages and risks of combined laser treatment with skin boosters (hyaluronic acid, polynucleotides, or peptide-based injectables). Read thoroughly and discuss with your practitioner before proceeding.

Take time to consider all options, seek second opinions, and ask questions. The protocol typically involves laser treatment (Pico, fractional non-ablative, or laser toning) followed immediately or 1-2 weeks later by skin booster microinjections to enhance hydration, reduce laser-induced inflammation, and amplify collagen stimulation for superior texture, tone, and glow. Numbing cream and skin cleansing first; sessions last 45-75 minutes. Typically 3-4 combined treatments spaced 3-4 weeks apart; optimal results at 2-4 months.

Mild redness/swelling from laser plus small injection bumps expected 2-5 days; avoid sun exposure 1 week pre/post (SPF 50+ mandatory), no makeup 24-48 hours, gentle hydration post-care. Multiple sessions required; informed of practitioner each session, withdraw consent anytime.

RISKS AND POSSIBLE REACTIONS: Common: temporary redness, swelling, bruising at injection sites, dryness (3-7 days). Less common: post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation, milia, vascular occlusion (rare with superficial boosters).

Rare: infection, allergic reaction, granulomas, herpes reactivation. Contraindications: active skin infections, recent fillers (wait 2 weeks), pregnancy/breastfeeding, autoimmune disorders, blood thinners, keloid history.

I confirm understanding of procedure reasons, risks (including not treating), personal health risks, benefits, alternatives (separate treatments), uncertainties, follow-up care.

MEDICAL IMAGERY: I authorize clinical photos/videos for confidential records.

I certify reading/understanding this form, questions answered satisfactorily, and consent to procedure.

questions.content: Do you comprehend the details that have been given to you?
Do you believe enough information has been shared to allow you to give informed consent?
Have you given your consent voluntarily?
Are there any health issues you currently have?
Are you currently pregnant or nursing a child?
Do you suffer from a neuromuscular disorder (such as Multiple Sclerosis, ALS, motor neuropathy, myasthenia gravis, or Lambert-Eaton syndrome)?
Do you have an autoimmune condition?
Do you experience any skin problems?
Do you have any known allergies or a history of severe allergic reactions (anaphylaxis)?
Is there an active infection at the area where the procedure is planned?
Are you currently on any antibiotics or other prescribed medications?
Is there any other Medical or Social History we should be aware of? If yes, please explain in detail.
What are your goals and desired results for undergoing this procedure? Please elaborate.
Have you undergone this or a comparable treatment previously? If so, were there any issues? Please provide details.
Do you have any concerns? If so, please describe them.
Is there anything else we need to know? Please provide full information.
I will keep this information for the duration of my treatment and consult it as needed.
